mn60:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena sālā nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
mn60:3.4: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ sālaṃ anuppatto.
mn60:3.5: Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn60:3.6: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’ti.
mn60:3.7: So imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
mn60:3.8: So dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
mn60:3.9: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti.
mn60:3.10: Atha kho sāleyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
mn60:3.11: upasaṅkamitvā appekacce bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
mn60:3.13: sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
mn60:3.14: Appekacce yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
mn60:3.15: Appekacce bhagavato santike nāmagottaṃ sāvetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
mn60:4.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho sāleyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike bhagavā etadavoca:
mn60:4.2: “atthi pana vo, gahapatayo, koci manāpo satthā yasmiṃ vo ākāravatī saddhā paṭiladdhā”ti?
mn60:4.3: “Natthi kho no, bhante, koci manāpo satthā yasmiṃ no ākāravatī saddhā paṭiladdhā”ti.
mn60:5.1: “Manāpaṃ vo, gahapatayo, satthāraṃ alabhantehi ayaṃ apaṇṇako dhammo samādāya vattitabbo.
mn60:5.2: Apaṇṇako hi, gahapatayo, dhammo samatto samādinno, so vo bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
mn60:6.1: Santi, gahapatayo, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:6.3: natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko;
mn60:6.6: natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammā paṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
mn60:6.7: Tesaṃyeva kho, gahapatayo, samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā ujuvipaccanīkavādā.
mn60:6.11: atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paro loko;
mn60:6.14: atthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammā paṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
mn60:7.1: “Tatra, gahapatayo, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:7.4: ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti tesametaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
mn60:7.6: ime tayo kusale dhamme abhinivajjetvā yamidaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ, vacīduccaritaṃ, manoduccaritaṃ—
mn60:7.7: ime tayo akusale dhamme samādāya vattissanti.
mn60:7.9: Na hi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā passanti akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ vodānapakkhaṃ.
mn60:7.10: Santaṃyeva pana paraṃ lokaṃ ‘natthi paro loko’ tissa diṭṭhi hoti;
mn60:7.12: Santaṃyeva kho pana paraṃ lokaṃ ‘natthi paro loko’ti saṅkappeti;
mn60:7.14: Santaṃyeva kho pana paraṃ lokaṃ ‘natthi paro loko’ti vācaṃ bhāsati;
mn60:7.16: Santaṃyeva kho pana paraṃ lokaṃ ‘natthi paro loko’ti āha;
mn60:7.17: ye te arahanto paralokaviduno tesamayaṃ paccanīkaṃ karoti.
mn60:7.18: Santaṃyeva kho pana paraṃ lokaṃ ‘natthi paro loko’ti paraṃ saññāpeti;
mn60:7.20: Tāya ca pana asaddhammasaññattiyā attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti.
mn60:7.21: Iti pubbeva kho panassa susīlyaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti, dussīlyaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ—
mn60:7.22: ayañca micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā ariyānaṃ paccanīkatā asaddhammasaññatti attukkaṃsanā paravambhanā.
mn60:7.23: Evamassime aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti micchādiṭṭhipaccayā.
mn60:8.1: Tatra, gahapatayo, viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn60:8.2: ‘sace kho natthi paro loko evamayaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo kāyassa bhedā sotthimattānaṃ karissati;
mn60:8.3: sace kho atthi paro loko, evamayaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjissati.
mn60:8.4: Kāmaṃ kho pana māhu paro loko, hotu nesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ vacanaṃ;
mn60:8.5: atha ca panāyaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo diṭṭheva dhamme viññūnaṃ gārayho—
mn60:8.7: Sace kho attheva paro loko, evaṃ imassa bhoto purisapuggalassa ubhayattha kaliggaho—
mn60:8.8: yañca diṭṭheva dhamme viññūnaṃ gārayho, yañca kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjissati.
mn60:8.9: Evamassāyaṃ apaṇṇako dhammo dussamatto samādinno, ekaṃsaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati, riñcati kusalaṃ ṭhānaṃ.

mn60:11.1: Santi, gahapatayo, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:11.2: ‘karoto kārayato, chindato chedāpayato, pacato pācāpayato, socayato socāpayato, kilamato kilamāpayato, phandato phandāpayato, pāṇamatipātayato, adinnaṃ ādiyato, sandhiṃ chindato, nillopaṃ harato, ekāgārikaṃ karoto, paripanthe tiṭṭhato, paradāraṃ gacchato, musā bhaṇato;
mn60:11.4: Khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissā pathaviyā pāṇe ekaṃ maṃsakhalaṃ ekaṃ maṃsapuñjaṃ kareyya, natthi tatonidānaṃ pāpaṃ, natthi pāpassa āgamo.
mn60:11.5: Dakkhiṇañcepi gaṅgāya tīraṃ gaccheyya hananto ghātento, chindanto chedāpento, pacanto pācento;
mn60:11.6: natthi tatonidānaṃ pāpaṃ, natthi pāpassa āgamo.
mn60:11.7: Uttarañcepi gaṅgāya tīraṃ gaccheyya dadanto dāpento, yajanto yajāpento;
mn60:11.8: natthi tatonidānaṃ puññaṃ, natthi puññassa āgamo.
mn60:11.9: Dānena damena saṃyamena saccavajjena natthi puññaṃ, natthi puññassa āgamo’ti.
mn60:11.10: Tesaṃyeva kho, gahapatayo, samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā ujuvipaccanīkavādā te evamāhaṃsu:
mn60:11.11: ‘karoto kārayato, chindato chedāpayato, pacato pācāpayato, socayato socāpayato, kilamato kilamāpayato, phandato phandāpayato, pāṇamatipātayato, adinnaṃ ādiyato, sandhiṃ chindato, nillopaṃ harato, ekāgārikaṃ karoto, paripanthe tiṭṭhato, paradāraṃ gacchato, musā bhaṇato;
mn60:11.13: Khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissā pathaviyā pāṇe ekaṃ maṃsakhalaṃ ekaṃ maṃsapuñjaṃ kareyya, atthi tatonidānaṃ pāpaṃ, atthi pāpassa āgamo.
mn60:11.14: Dakkhiṇañcepi gaṅgāya tīraṃ gaccheyya hananto ghātento, chindanto chedāpento, pacanto pācento;
mn60:11.15: atthi tatonidānaṃ pāpaṃ, atthi pāpassa āgamo.
mn60:11.16: Uttarañcepi gaṅgāya tīraṃ gaccheyya dadanto dāpento, yajanto yajāpento;
mn60:11.17: atthi tatonidānaṃ puññaṃ, atthi puññassa āgamo.
mn60:11.18: Dānena damena saṃyamena saccavajjena atthi puññaṃ, atthi puññassa āgamo’ti.
mn60:11.19: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, gahapatayo, nanume samaṇabrāhmaṇā aññamaññassa ujuvipaccanīkavādā”ti?

mn60:16.4: Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;

mn60:16.7: sabbe sattā sabbe pāṇā sabbe bhūtā sabbe jīvā avasā abalā avīriyā niyatisaṃgatibhāvapariṇatā chasvevābhijātīsu sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentī’ti.
mn60:16.8: Tesaṃyeva kho, gahapatayo, samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā ujuvipaccanīkavādā.
mn60:16.12: Atthi hetu, atthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
mn60:16.14: Atthi balaṃ, atthi vīriyaṃ, atthi purisathāmo, atthi purisaparakkamo;
mn60:16.15: na sabbe sattā sabbe pāṇā sabbe bhūtā sabbe jīvā avasā abalā avīriyā niyatisaṃgatibhāvapariṇatā chasvevābhijātīsu sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentī’ti.
mn60:16.16: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, gahapatayo, nanume samaṇabrāhmaṇā aññamaññassa ujuvipaccanīkavādā”ti?
mn60:17.1: “Tatra, gahapatayo, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:17.4: Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
mn60:17.6: Natthi balaṃ, natthi vīriyaṃ, natthi purisathāmo, natthi purisaparakkamo;
mn60:17.7: sabbe sattā sabbe pāṇā sabbe bhūtā sabbe jīvā avasā abalā avīriyā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā chasvevābhijātīsu sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentī’ti tesametaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
mn60:17.9: ime tayo kusale dhamme abhinivajjetvā yamidaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ, vacīduccaritaṃ, manoduccaritaṃ—
mn60:17.10: ime tayo akusale dhamme samādāya vattissanti.
mn60:17.12: Na hi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā passanti akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṅkilesaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ vodānapakkhaṃ.
mn60:17.13: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘natthi hetū’ tissa diṭṭhi hoti;
mn60:17.15: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘natthi hetū’ti saṅkappeti;
mn60:17.17: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘natthi hetū’ti vācaṃ bhāsati;
mn60:17.19: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘natthi hetū’ti āha;
mn60:17.20: ye te arahanto hetuvādā tesamayaṃ paccanīkaṃ karoti.
mn60:17.21: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘natthi hetū’ti paraṃ saññāpeti;
mn60:17.23: Tāya ca pana asaddhammasaññattiyā attānukkaṃseti, paraṃ vambheti.
mn60:17.24: Iti pubbeva kho panassa susīlyaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti, dussīlyaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ—
mn60:17.25: ayañca micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā ariyānaṃ paccanīkatā asaddhammasaññatti attānukkaṃsanā paravambhanā.
mn60:17.26: Evamassime aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti micchādiṭṭhipaccayā.
mn60:18.1: Tatra, gahapatayo, viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn60:18.2: ‘sace kho natthi hetu, evamayaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sotthimattānaṃ karissati;
mn60:18.3: sace kho atthi hetu, evamayaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjissati.
mn60:18.4: Kāmaṃ kho pana māhu hetu, hotu nesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ vacanaṃ;
mn60:18.5: atha ca panāyaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo diṭṭheva dhamme viññūnaṃ gārayho—
mn60:18.7: Sace kho attheva hetu, evaṃ imassa bhoto purisapuggalassa ubhayattha kaliggaho—
mn60:18.8: yañca diṭṭheva dhamme viññūnaṃ gārayho, yañca kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjissati.
mn60:18.9: Evamassāyaṃ apaṇṇako dhammo dussamatto samādinno, ekaṃsaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati, riñcati kusalaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
mn60:19.1: Tatra, gahapatayo, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:19.4: Atthi hetu, atthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
mn60:19.6: Atthi balaṃ, atthi vīriyaṃ, atthi purisathāmo, atthi purisaparakkamo;
mn60:19.7: na sabbe sattā sabbe pāṇā sabbe bhūtā sabbe jīvā avasā abalā avīriyā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā chasvevābhijātīsu sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentī’ti tesametaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
mn60:19.9: ime tayo akusale dhamme abhinivajjetvā yamidaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ, vacīsucaritaṃ, manosucaritaṃ—
mn60:19.10: ime tayo kusale dhamme samādāya vattissanti.
mn60:19.12: Passanti hi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṅkilesaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ vodānapakkhaṃ.
mn60:19.13: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘atthi hetū’ tissa diṭṭhi hoti;
mn60:19.15: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘atthi hetū’ti saṅkappeti;
mn60:19.17: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘atthi hetū’ti vācaṃ bhāsati;
mn60:19.19: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘atthi hetū’ti āha, ye te arahanto hetuvādā tesamayaṃ na paccanīkaṃ karoti.
mn60:19.20: Santaṃyeva kho pana hetuṃ ‘atthi hetū’ti paraṃ saññāpeti;
mn60:19.22: Tāya ca pana saddhammasaññattiyā nevattānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti.
mn60:19.23: Iti pubbeva kho panassa dussīlyaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti, susīlyaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ—
mn60:19.24: ayañca sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā ariyānaṃ apaccanīkatā saddhammasaññatti anattukkaṃsanā aparavambhanā.
mn60:19.25: Evamassime aneke kusalā dhammā sambhavanti sammādiṭṭhipaccayā.
mn60:20.1: Tatra, gahapatayo, viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn60:20.2: ‘sace kho atthi hetu, evamayaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissati.
mn60:20.3: Kāmaṃ kho pana māhu hetu, hotu nesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ vacanaṃ;
mn60:20.4: atha ca panāyaṃ bhavaṃ purisapuggalo diṭṭheva dhamme viññūnaṃ pāsaṃso—
mn60:20.6: Sace kho atthi hetu, evaṃ imassa bhoto purisapuggalassa ubhayattha kaṭaggaho—
mn60:20.7: yañca diṭṭheva dhamme viññūnaṃ pāsaṃso, yañca kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissati.
mn60:20.8: Evamassāyaṃ apaṇṇako dhammo susamatto samādinno, ubhayaṃsaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati, riñcati akusalaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
mn60:21.1: Santi, gahapatayo, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:21.3: Tesaṃyeva kho, gahapatayo, samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā ujuvipaccanīkavādā.
mn60:21.6: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, gahapatayo, nanume samaṇabrāhmaṇā aññamaññassa ujuvipaccanīkavādā”ti?
mn60:22.2: ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:22.4: yepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:22.6: Ahañceva kho pana ajānanto apassanto ekaṃsena ādāya vohareyyaṃ—
mn60:22.7: idameva saccaṃ, moghamaññanti, na metaṃ assa patirūpaṃ.
mn60:22.8: Ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:22.9: ‘natthi sabbaso āruppā’ti, sace tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ vacanaṃ, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati—
mn60:22.10: ye te devā rūpino manomayā, apaṇṇakaṃ me tatrūpapatti bhavissati.
mn60:22.11: Ye pana te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:22.12: ‘atthi sabbaso āruppā’ti, sace tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ vacanaṃ, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati—
mn60:22.13: ye te devā arūpino saññāmayā, apaṇṇakaṃ me tatrūpapatti bhavissati.
mn60:22.16: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya rūpānaṃyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
mn60:23.1: Santi, gahapatayo, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:23.3: Tesaṃyeva kho, gahapatayo, samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā ujuvipaccanīkavādā.
mn60:23.6: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, gahapatayo, nanume samaṇabrāhmaṇā aññamaññassa ujuvipaccanīkavādā”ti?
mn60:24.2: ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:24.4: yepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:24.6: Ahañceva kho pana ajānanto apassanto ekaṃsena ādāya vohareyyaṃ—
mn60:24.7: idameva saccaṃ, moghamaññanti, na metaṃ assa patirūpaṃ.
mn60:24.8: Ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:24.9: ‘natthi sabbaso bhavanirodho’ti, sace tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ vacanaṃ, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati—
mn60:24.10: ye te devā arūpino saññāmayā apaṇṇakaṃ me tatrūpapatti bhavissati.
mn60:24.11: Ye pana te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:24.12: ‘atthi sabbaso bhavanirodho’ti, sace tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ vacanaṃ, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati—
mn60:24.14: Ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:24.15: ‘natthi sabbaso bhavanirodho’ti, tesamayaṃ diṭṭhi sārāgāya santike, saṃyogāya santike, abhinandanāya santike, ajjhosānāya santike, upādānāya santike.
mn60:24.16: Ye pana te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn60:24.17: ‘atthi sabbaso bhavanirodho’ti, tesamayaṃ diṭṭhi asārāgāya santike, asaṃyogāya santike, anabhinandanāya santike, anajjhosānāya santike, anupādānāya santiketi.
mn60:24.18: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya bhavānaṃyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
mn60:25.1: Cattārome, gahapatayo, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
mn60:25.3: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:25.4: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:25.5: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:25.6: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo nevattantapo hoti nāttaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto;
mn60:25.7: so anattantapo aparantapo diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītībhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharati.
mn60:26.1: Katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto?
mn60:26.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo acelako hoti muttācāro hatthāpalekhano …
mn60:26.4: iti evarūpaṃ anekavihitaṃ kāyassa ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
mn60:26.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:27.1: Katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo parantapo paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto?
mn60:27.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo orabbhiko hoti sūkariko …
mn60:27.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo parantapo paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:28.1: Katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto?
mn60:28.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo rājā vā hoti khattiyo muddhāvasitto …
mn60:28.4: tepi daṇḍatajjitā bhayatajjitā assumukhā rudamānā parikammāni karonti.
mn60:28.5: Ayaṃ vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto.
mn60:29.1: Katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo nevattantapo nāttaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto;
mn60:29.2: so anattantapo aparantapo diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītībhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharati?
mn60:29.3: Idha, gahapatayo, tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho …
mn60:29.5: so ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
mn60:29.6: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …
mn60:30.1: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti.
mn60:30.5: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
mn60:30.6: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti.
mn60:30.7: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate …
mn60:30.10: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti.
mn60:30.14: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati, bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati, avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati.
mn60:30.16: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
mn60:30.17: Ayaṃ vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo nevattantapo nāttaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto;
mn60:30.18: so anattantapo aparantapo diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītībhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharatī”ti.
mn60:31.1: Evaṃ vutte, sāleyyakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn60:31.3: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
mn60:31.4: evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
mn60:31.5: Ete mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
mn60:31.6: Upāsake no bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gate”ti.
